entry.title: mainframecomputer/fullmoon-ios
entry.summary:
chat with private and local large language models

fullmoon iOS

fullmoon is an iOS app to chat with local large language models thatâ€™s optimized for Apple silicon and works on iPhone, iPad, and Mac. your chat history is saved locally, and you can customize the appearance of the app.

supported models

  • Llama 3.2 1B
  • Llama 3.2 3B

credits

fullmoon is made possible by MLX Swift from Apple. MLX is an array framework for machine learning research on Apple silicon.
